1.name: a jail cell
1.description:
a small room with a metal bed in one corner.
You said 'No jail can hold me'
You notice a key sitting on your bed

bed.description: Hard looks cold. Has a jailkey sitting on top of it

north.lockedMsg: You need a key to open this door
north.unlockMsg: You reach around the door and use the jail key
breaks: The key gets stuck in the door rending it useless

2.name: kitchen
2.description: smaller room smells like burnt food
